titleStmt.title: Adams tragedie declaring Satans malice and subtiltie, mans weaknesse and miserie, and his deliuerance from eternall captiuitie.
titleStmt.author: Mabb, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.W. for Thomas Downe and Ephraim Dawson, and are to be solde at their shoppe at the Inner Temple gate,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Mabb by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: their shoppe at the Inner Temple gate
